ticket.title: I18n label for modulized records
ticket.original-body:
When having a record like Customer::Ticket << ActiveRecord::Base
i would expect to have in my translation en: helpers: label: 'customer/customer' attribute: Translation
but it only works with: en: helpers: label: 'customer_customer' attribute: Translation
